LanguageData.FRMT_LacticAcidBacteria.label: Lactic Acid Bacteria
LanguageData.FRMT_LacticAcidBacteria.description: Lactic acid bacterium sourced from the fermentation of carbohydrates.
LanguageData.FRMT_StarchMash.label: Starch Mash
LanguageData.FRMT_StarchMash.description: Starchy vegetables that has been crudely chopped into a mash. Can be fermented into lactic acid bacteria.
